import React from 'react' const About = () => { return (

About

I Design website and build it from scratch using multiple platform like figma WordPress etc. I also make 3D object and AR filter for Various platform like Facebook, Instagram, snapchat etc. I'm a product designer based in Surat, Gujarat with experience in delivering end-to-end UX/UI design for software products. I'm passionate about improving the lives of others through design and I am constantly looking to learn new things everyday.


) } export default About
